Name: Dark Shrine
About the game: Dark Shrine is a short horror game set in a japanese shrine. The map design was inspired by the actual place in Kyoto, Fushimi Inari Shrine. You are stuck in a shrine covered with dark, you have to find the way out watching out for the ghost. Offer 3 bells to the alter, disable the barrier and escape.
